name: Scooby Doo & Scrappy Doo: Rescue of Shaggy
name_original: Scooby Doo & Scrappy Doo: Rescue of Shaggy
description:
Made with GB studio.

Controls:

Z (keyboard) works as Gameboy's B button (for handling Scooby Doo's actions)

X (keyboard) works as Gameboy's A button (for handling Scrappy's actions)

Q (keyboard) works as Gameboy's START button

 Fan made game based on the Scooby-Doo franchise, without financial gain

 Scooby-Doo, characters, names, and all related indicia are trademarks of Hanna-Barbera © 2021
